resources.string: Thank you for using our app. We are glad we could help with your work. To upload your report click the button below.
Sorry, the program failed to solve your issue with the answers you gave. Please contact a technician.
We are sorry for not helping with your work. Maybe a technician could help you. Please finish the report by clicking the button below to help us improve the system.
Welcome to the FaultAssist project. This program will try to solve the issues you are reporting by asking you about the machines. To start with the report, please scan the machine\'s QR code.
